mapper.update: update pet_knowledge set kno_title = #{knoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kno_category = #{knoCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specie_id = #{specieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, variety_id = #{varietyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kno_images = #{knoImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, kno_content = #{knoContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where kno_id = #{knoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select kno_id, kno_title, kno_category, specie_id, variety_id, kno_images, created_at, updated_at, kno_content from pet_knowledge where kno_id = #{knoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select kno_id, kno_title, kno_category, specie_id, variety_id, kno_images, created_at, updated_at, kno_content from pet_knowledge
